trans-unit.source: When you create a web app, Microsoft Azure provides a friendly subdomain on the azurewebsites.net domain so your users can access your web app using a URL like http://<mywebapp>.azurewebsites.net.
trans-unit.target: When you create a web app, Microsoft Azure provides a friendly subdomain on the azurewebsites.net domain so your users can access your web app using a URL like http://<mywebapp>.azurewebsites.net.

trans-unit.source: You can also associate a custom domain name, such as contoso.com, with your web app in order to provide a more recognizable domain name for your users.
trans-unit.target: You can also associate a custom domain name, such as contoso.com, with your web app in order to provide a more recognizable domain name for your users.
